item.title: Fedora Gaming Setup Guide
item.description: This is a page about »Fedora Gaming Setup Guide« This is how I’ve setup my system for gaming, this is all done on Fedora 40 https://fedoraproject.org/workstation/ Speed up DNF sudo nano /etc/dnf/dnf.conf Add this: max_parallel_downloads=20 fastestmirror=True I actually didn’t add the second line “fastestmirror=True”, I also haven’t felt like I needed it. So “max_parallel_downloads” might be all you need, and you can set it to whichever number suits you. I set mine to 20 because my internet is great.
